title: Question:
author: redhack
content: Welcome to the non-self-moderated UEFA Conference League 2023/24 Season discussion thread.Old thread: UEFA Conference League 2022/23 SeasonFirst champion: RomaLast champion: West Ham UnitedLet's start the discussion by countries. Which country has more powerful clubs? Where do you think the cup will go? Which teams do you see favorite at the start of the season?

comments.author: Gencecikmen
comments.body: Tonight and tomorrow, the the first legs of the third qualifying round of the UEFA Conference League will be played. I think we will watch enjoyable matches for two days. The quality of the English Premier League has improved a lot in recent years. For this reason, English teams are favourites. But it's too early to decions now. After the play-off round is over, a more clearly idea can be opine.

comments.author: Jossque
comments.body: AEK Larnaca drew 1-1 at home against Tel Aviv.  It was a tough opponent for the hosts but they didn't play a good game. Tel Aviv were the better side and with this draw they have already secured half of the round. When you play away games, a draw is probably one of the best results for the away team. We can say that they will win at home in the rematch and go through.In the other match of the day, KAA Gent beat Pogon 4-0 in the first half. I think they secured the round from the first half. They played a dominant game in the first half of the match and we can say that they did not even give a position to their opponents. With 4 goals from 6 shots on target, Gent is playing with a good percentage.

comments.author: LGD2Business
comments.body: I hope one of the Turkish clubs win this trophy or at least play in the semi-finals this season. We represent our country in this cup with 3 teams and 2 teams really have strong squads that can win this cup. Of course, first of all, it's necessary to pass the play-off rounds and stay in the groups. No matter how much our teams give importance to this cup, it will be positive both for our coefficient score and for our real strength in European cups.I think that Beşiktaş and Fenerbahçe have a serious say. These teams are among the favorites of the cup with their transfers and squad quality. The opponents should be taken seriously, it's very important to pass the play-offs. I hope everything will be fine.

comments.author: borovichok
comments.body: Quote from: Gencecikmen on August 09, 2023, 01:19:59 PMTonight and tomorrow, the the first legs of the third qualifying round of the UEFA Conference League will be played. I think we will watch enjoyable matches for two days. The quality of the English Premier League has improved a lot in recent years. For this reason, English teams are favourites. But it's too early to decions now. After the play-off round is over, a more clearly idea can be opine.The UEFA Champions League is growing more fascinating after the English were named champions last season. Let us hope for the best from them this season. With the current scenarios and fixtures, the UEFA Conference League winners would be significant at significant occurrences. Westham United are the reigning champions, and they know exactly how to handle their game within the league. However, they may face some difficulties because their key midfielder, Declan Rice, has left the club. Hammers manager David Moyes may apply additional pressure to maintain his league position.

comments.author: Juggy777
comments.body: Quote from: Gencecikmen on August 09, 2023, 01:19:59 PMTonight and tomorrow, the the first legs of the third qualifying round of the UEFA Conference League will be played. I think we will watch enjoyable matches for two days. The quality of the English Premier League has improved a lot in recent years. For this reason, English teams are favourites. But it's too early to decions now. After the play-off round is over, a more clearly idea can be opine.@Gencecikmen I feel that Aston Villa has a very good chance of winning this competition because under Emery they can definitely pose a stiff challenge to other teams participating in this competition. Furthermore Villa may find it difficult to secure a 4th to 6th spot in the premier league hence I feel that they’ll target a Europa league spot by winning this competition and thus they’re my favourites from the premier league to win this competition.

comments.author: Pierre 2
comments.body: Thanks for finally opening whole new thread for this underrated UEFA tournament. Currently it seems like we are too early to point out future winner. Osasuna may not be seeded here in play-off phase which may result weirdly if they draw a club like, Eintracht Frankfurt or Aston Villa. Beşiktaş also may be one of the strongest unseeded teams that seeded ones would never want. I am waiting for their draws mainly to give us betting opportunities.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Quote from: Gencecikmen on August 09, 2023, 01:19:59 PMTonight and tomorrow, the the first legs of the third qualifying round of the UEFA Conference League will be played. I think we will watch enjoyable matches for two days. The quality of the English Premier League has improved a lot in recent years. For this reason, English teams are favourites. But it's too early to decions now. After the play-off round is over, a more clearly idea can be opine.I would like to do multi bet but im facing problems caused by almost all of clubs have been equal. It seems like that i would like to take the second leg rather than first leg. im very unfamiliar with so many clubs in the third qualifying round of conference league. The risk is very big to lose. Gent was able destroying pogon with very big scorers in the first leg. Im sure pogon has zero chance to beat gent. Gent will be dominating the second leg soon. 5-0 was a very big score for the first leg. Pogon is not lucky enough in this season caused by it faces strong club.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: The game of yesterday of Gent vs Pogon I wonder how can a team from the Poland league not be able to score at least one goal to a team from the Belgium league where in here most teams concede a lot of goals,I know the difference in quality and I know Gent was heavy favorite to pass the elimination round but I never expected a 5-0 complete domination from them.If you see the stats Pogon barely hit one time in the target and that shows that this team has no chances at all to a recovery in the return game in Poland.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: Pierre 2 on August 10, 2023, 05:31:41 AMThanks for finally opening whole new thread for this underrated UEFA tournament. Currently it seems like we are too early to point out future winner. Osasuna may not be seeded here in play-off phase which may result weirdly if they draw a club like, Eintracht Frankfurt or Aston Villa. Beşiktaş also may be one of the strongest unseeded teams that seeded ones would never want. I am waiting for their draws mainly to give us betting opportunities.Actually, the UEFA Conference Cup is not underestimated, but it's just because in this championship there are only a few popular clubs, so many football fans are not interested and leave this championship a little and prioritize important leagues such as the UCL, Premier League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, as well as the Saudi Pro League.Though the UEFA Conference Cup is also interesting and features quite stunning matches.There are several clubs that are very popular and also play in this championship, such as West Ham United, Fiorentina, which are the two clubs that made it to the final last season, and many more clubs.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: Quote from: JossqueAEK Larnaca drew 1-1 at home against Tel Aviv.  It was a tough opponent for the hosts but they didn't play a good game. Tel Aviv were the better side and with this draw they have already secured half of the round. When you play away games, a draw is probably one of the best results for the away team. We can say that they will win at home in the rematch and go through.It was a tough match for both teams, because they understood each other steps from the beginning of the match till the end of the match that made the AEK Larnaca draw the match 1-1 with Tel Aviv, which AEK  Larnaca manager was not happy the way the match ended in the second half in their home. I think, Tel Aviv will use second leg advantage to defeat their opponent, since they were able to drew the match with AEK Larnaca in their home, I believe there is a hope for them to use all their home strategies to embrace more goals to achieve victory at the end of the match. I don't think, Tel Aviv manager will allow their fans to experience any fear in their next match, because he knows where the fault came from and he is ready to solve the problem before their next match.

comments.author: karabiber
comments.body: Quote from: swogerino on August 10, 2023, 06:51:57 AMThe game of yesterday of Gent vs Pogon I wonder how can a team from the Poland league not be able to score at least one goal to a team from the Belgium league where in here most teams concede a lot of goals,I know the difference in quality and I know Gent was heavy favorite to pass the elimination round but I never expected a 5-0 complete domination from them.If you see the stats Pogon barely hit one time in the target and that shows that this team has no chances at all to a recovery in the return game in Poland.I feel sorry for the fans of Pogon Szczecin. Because the game Pogon played in this match was a complete disaster. The Pogon goalkeeper was like Gent's number 12 player. The defensive line was almost nonexistent. If only Pogon had come into the game with 10 forwards, they would have been less infamous. Losing is always possible in football but losing has its etiquette. To lose or to be disgraced? The Polish League Ekstraklasa needs to make progress. Of course we can see the Polish teams in better positions in the next years with the right decisions. I can say that i watched football in the form of a friendly match. I hope the Pogon technical staff understand that it is necessary for the Pogon goalkeeper not to go to the goal in the next match.

comments.author: Gencecikmen
comments.body: Quote from: borovichok on August 10, 2023, 03:10:03 AMQuote from: Gencecikmen on August 09, 2023, 01:19:59 PMTonight and tomorrow, the the first legs of the third qualifying round of the UEFA Conference League will be played. I think we will watch enjoyable matches for two days. The quality of the English Premier League has improved a lot in recent years. For this reason, English teams are favourites. But it's too early to decions now. After the play-off round is over, a more clearly idea can be opine.The UEFA Champions League is growing more fascinating after the English were named champions last season. Let us hope for the best from them this season. With the current scenarios and fixtures, the UEFA Conference League winners would be significant at significant occurrences. Westham United are the reigning champions, and they know exactly how to handle their game within the league. However, they may face some difficulties because their key midfielder, Declan Rice, has left the club. Hammers manager David Moyes may apply additional pressure to maintain his league position.I absolutely agree with you. West Ham United could be in big trouble absense Declan Rice. He was a very important player for West Ham. Declan Rice is a solid midfielder.Quote from: Juggy777 on August 10, 2023, 04:08:49 AMQuote from: Gencecikmen on August 09, 2023, 01:19:59 PMTonight and tomorrow, the the first legs of the third qualifying round of the UEFA Conference League will be played. I think we will watch enjoyable matches for two days. The quality of the English Premier League has improved a lot in recent years. For this reason, English teams are favourites. But it's too early to decions now. After the play-off round is over, a more clearly idea can be opine.@Gencecikmen I feel that Aston Villa has a very good chance of winning this competition because under Emery they can definitely pose a stiff challenge to other teams participating in this competition. Furthermore Villa may find it difficult to secure a 4th to 6th spot in the premier league hence I feel that they’ll target a Europa league spot by winning this competition and thus they’re my favourites from the premier league to win this competition.I think the same as you. An other way to get to Europe Cups is the UEFA Conference League, so the English clubs will do their best, as West Ham did last year.

comments.author: LGD2Business
comments.body: I expected more resistance from Neftçi Baku PFK, but Beşiktaş didn't give them a chance. Beşiktaş had a comfortable match especially with the effective game in the first half and 2 goals scored.Again, Aboubakar showed his finishing. Salih Uçan, on the other hand, had one of the best matches he played. He showed that he is an important midfield player with both assists and assist passes. As long as he performs like this, Beşiktaş's offensive organizations become better.Muleka, who made a good start this season, also scored again. Gedson played his usual game. Despite their shortcomings, Beşiktaş shows us that they are on the right track. They will pass this tour comfortably. The 3-1 score in the first match made the rematch much more comfortable.

comments.author: LGD2Business
comments.body: Today we saw again that Beşiktaş's backups are not that good, but their ace squad is great. New signings are needed to increase the depth of the squad. Especially Center Back and Left Back are a must for the team. Masuaku is very good, but Umut Meraş is insufficient in that position. Colley can be a good duo with Amartey when he returns, but that's not enough for the next tours.Again, Aboubakar showed off his great finishing. Likewise, Muleka created the goal out of nothing. The team is getting better, but it should be better. Because the goal is to win this trophy.

comments.author: Gencecikmen
comments.body: The the first legs of the play-off round of the UEFA Conference League are currently being played. I prefer to watch Fenerbahçe and Beşiktaş matches. Fenerbahce is lead 3-1 and Beşiktaş is lead 2-1. I believe both teams will go to the group stage of the UEFA Conference League. When the Fenerbahce and Besiktas match is over, I will prefer to watch the Adana Demirspor match.

comments.author: meser#
comments.body: Now I try to follow Beşiktaş and Fenerbahçe's matches, but I also have a lot of work to do. Whenever I have a lot of work like this, there are exciting matches anyway  I hope Beşiktaş and Fenerbahçe will continue their journey without any losses. It's hard for Fenerbahce to lose, but Besiktas will have a tough job against Dynamo Kiev team that reacts instantly. My screen is split in four right now, I can't focus on work or I can't stop working and watch the matches

comments.author: emrecemsan
comments.body: It feels like even all of the Turkish teams competing in the Champions League and Conference League together will manage to make it to the group stage. I have been really enjoying the overall performance of these teams. Right now their matches in the Conference League are going on and all of them are likely to get an advantageous result for the second leg with their game. Fenerbahce are destroying Twente by 4-1. That red card made things much easier. Besiktas got ahead 2 times and still can win this.I'm only not sure about Adana Demirspor as they are new around here. Their opponent Genk is really experienced. But considering their effort so far they can also get some decent result in this away match maybe.

comments.author: rendravolt
comments.body: I really don't understand what happened to Fiorentina, they even lost to a team far below them. Even though this is an away game, at least Fiorentina must win even if only by a thin score. But what happened was just the opposite, Rapid Wien, who got a goal from the penalty spot, managed to maintain this advantage until the match was over. It seems that Fiorentina couldn't do anything either, after the goal Rapid Wien just wanted to survive and they believed that Fiorentina would not be able to equalize this narrow advantage.

comments.author: meser#
comments.body: Today is turning out to be a really great day for our Turkish teams. First, Fenerbahçe won 5-1, and then Beşiktaş reached a victory with a 3-2 score (Beşiktaş's match was really entertaining especially last 15 minute). Just when I was about to watch Adana Demirspor's match, when I opened the channel they find the 1-0. Let's hope we continue with a flawless record today.
